readable.title: 1569687608_0e3b3ad044
readable.content: Two girls are wearing life vests and hugging each other . Two little girls are posing for a picture on a boat . Two little girls on a boat pose for a picture together . Two smiling little girls in a boat on a lake are hugging . Two young fair girls are smiling a posing together while they ride in a boat wearing floatation vests .
